text: @FredTJoseph @gofundme Praying you see this Fred my girlfriend is pregnant we have 2 puppies living in a small apartment in newyork we can't afford food and short on rent, her mother just tested positive for Covid-19 yesterday I lost my job from Covid-19 I have been trying for 9 days  🙏 $GoneNutty
